snippet: The owner of a building at 31 Bond Street emphasizes its desirable neighborhood, but in 1857, a sensational crime was committed at the site.
abstract: Joshua Gurwitz, owner and developer of 31 Bond Street in desirable NoHo neighborhood, does not intend to capitalize on site's notoriety as the location of gruesome 1857 murder when he converts building into condominiums; Dr Harvey Burdell, prominent dentist, was found dead in his second-floor office in sea of blood, strangled and stabbed 15 times, including twice in his heart.
lead_paragraph: The owner of a building at 31 Bond Street emphasizes its desirable neighborhood, but in 1857, a sensational crime was committed at the site.

headline.main: NoHo Real Estate That Comes With a Tale of Murder
headline.print_headline: Real Estate That Comes With a Tale of Murder
